title: karuNAnidhiyin appanE
sahitya:
karuNAnidhiyE appanE endaiyE abhirAmam pADiyE porkkazhal paNindEn


anupallavi

  karuNai vAriyE varuvAi taruNamE tiruvAi malarndE taruvAi AsiyE


caraNam    arunAL kalakE vaTTamAi vaguttE AreTTE adilum reTTittE ninra
nuNmaiyin nAdatil layittiDum nAthanE uNmaiyE uraittiDum abirahAm dEvanE
